name: User can sign up an Internal Persona account successfully

testSteps.description: Example #1: {domain=@qa.team, password=Aa@123456, title=Verify Email, script=window.open('https://qa.team/','_blank');, titlelogin=Log In}

children.description: Given Navigate to Sign Up page
When Generates randomly Firstname, Lastname with email "@qa.team" and "Aa@123456"
And User enters valid data on each field
And User clicks on Sign Up button
And The Verify Email page is displayed with correct "Verify Email"
And Navigate to email generating website by "window.open('https://qa.team/','_blank');"
And Enter verification code from the generating email website
And User clicks on Confirm button
And Account information is saved to file InternalPersonaAccounts.csv
Then The Login page "Log In" is displayed correctly

title: User can sign up an Internal Persona account successfully

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given Navigate to Sign Up page
When Generates randomly Firstname, Lastname with email "<domain>" and "<password>"
And User enters valid data on each field
And User clicks on Sign Up button
And The Verify Email page is displayed with correct "<title>"
And Navigate to email generating website by "<script>"
And Enter verification code from the generating email website
And User clicks on Confirm button
And Account information is saved to file InternalPersonaAccounts.csv
Then The Login page "<titlelogin>" is displayed correctly
